alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 29 at 4:18PM MDT until March 29 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...North winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 50 to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Johnson County. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation especially on west-to-east orientated roadways. Elevated to extreme blowover risk for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of dust reducing visibility to under a half mile are possible.
info.instruction: Please keep both hands on your steering wheel in case of a strong wind gust. In a parking log, park into the wind to minimize the possibility of your car door hitting another parked vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
